message.body: Hows it going? Where are you based?
Hey sorry. Work got super hectic. I'm in Philly tho.
Where are you in the world?
I live in FL. Used to live in west philly though. guess thats how i got connected with all this madness.
Makes sense. Did you do the phone call voice study things the previous years for them as well?
I did, & all manner of other philly guinea pig activities. Are you from the area?
Yeah, I've been in Philly for the past 15 or so years.
I've been hoping to relocate away from Philly for a few years now but can't seem to pull the trigger.
Right on. I didnt enjoy myself there very much but that was mostly my own fault. What do you do in philly?
I loved Philly at first for a long time but I just need a change. I'm a messenger. You?
A bike messenger? That was such a scene when i was there! I'm an electrician.
I'm also pretty into the outdoors, particularly paddling, am pretty civicly-engaged, enjoy travel, and loooove nerdy board games. What are you into?
